meanings.sent1: My friend's last name is Biggs.
meanings.sent2: The Biggs family is hosting a party next week.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if Mr. Biggs is related to the famous singer.
meanings.sent4: In the small town, everyone knows the Biggs name.
meanings.sent5: The Biggs surname has a long history in this community.

meanings.definition: Biggs (verb): To engage in a heated argument or fight.
meanings.sent1: The siblings always Biggs over who gets to use the computer first.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors Biggs loudly late into the night.
meanings.sent3: It's not worth it to Biggs over such a trivial matter.
meanings.sent4: The two teams Biggs fiercely for the championship title.
meanings.sent5: The politicians Biggs over the new policy proposal.

meanings.definition: Biggs (adjective): Large in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The elephant is a biggs animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She carried a biggs bag full of groceries.
meanings.sent3: The biggs cake at the party was a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent4: The biggs mountain stood majestically against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The biggs tree provided shade for the entire park.
